meanings.definition: A large self-service retail store selling food and household goods.
meanings.sent1: I went to the supermarkets to buy some fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: My mom asked me to pick up some milk from the supermarkets on my way home.
meanings.sent3: The supermarkets were so crowded that I felt like I was in a maze of aisles.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast supermarkets of memories, each shelf holding a different moment.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the supermarkets beckoned shoppers like moths to a flame.

meanings.sent1: We decided to stop by the supermarkets to grab some snacks for the movie night.
meanings.sent2: The supermarkets on the corner always had the freshest produce in town.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bumped into an old friend at the supermarkets while reaching for cereal.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a supermarkets of emotions, each aisle representing a different feeling.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly baked bread wafted through the supermarkets, making my stomach growl.
